references.paper_title: Optimal strategies and minimax lower bounds for online convex games
references.reason: This paper lays the foundation for universal online convex optimization algorithms by establishing optimal strategies and minimax lower bounds for online convex games.
This paper introduces AOGD, an adaptive algorithm for online convex optimization that achieves optimal regret bounds for general convex and strongly convex functions.
This book provides a comprehensive overview of prediction, learning, and game theory, which are fundamental concepts for understanding online convex optimization.
This foundational book provides a comprehensive introduction to online convex optimization, covering various algorithms and their properties.
This paper presents significant improvements to projection-free online learning methods, which are highly relevant to the efficiency goals of the current paper.
